sentences.en: As an example, suppose you're carving a gargoyle up in the corner of this building.
sentences.cn: 举个例子, 假设你在雕刻建筑高处的某一角上的滴水嘴怪.

sentences.en: During gargoyle waves, everybody needs to group back together to take down the bats.
sentences.cn: 在有鸟的波次, 每个人都要回到队伍中集中火力干掉这些鸟.

sentences.en: His disfigured face was like some avenging nemesis of gargoyle design.
sentences.cn: 他那张破了相的脸,活象面目狰狞的复仇之神.

sentences.en: His face was the gargoyle of the devil, it was not human , it was not sane.
sentences.cn: 他的脸简直就像魔鬼模样的屋檐滴水嘴.

sentences.en: Summon Gargoyle ( Tier 5 ) now has a 3 minute cooldown, down from 5.
sentences.cn: 召唤石像鬼 ( 第5层 ) 冷却从5分钟减少到3分钟.

sentences.en: We  suppose that  you're carving gargoyle up in the corner of this building .
sentences.cn: 我们假设你在雕刻建筑高处的某一角上的滴水嘴怪。

sentences.en: Week of Gargoyle: Double growth for Gargoyle and O idia Gargoyles.
sentences.cn: 石像鬼周: 石像鬼产量加倍.

trans.tran_en: a stone figure of a strange and ugly creature, that carries rain water from the roof of an old building, especially a church
